bill_context: H.R. 8821 - NDAA Floor Consideration, Amendment #47 - Cybersecurity Workforce Training
primary_message: Supporting our cybersecurity workforce strengthens national defense and creates economic opportunity for veterans
talking_points: Cybersecurity threats are growing - we need trained professionals to defend critical infrastructure
This amendment helps veterans transition to high-demand cybersecurity careers
Program prioritizes partnerships with HBCUs and community colleges to expand opportunity
$50M annually is modest investment compared to cybersecurity threat costs
opposition_response: If questioned on cost: 'The cost of a single successful cyberattack far exceeds this program's annual budget'
disclaimer: Floor messaging requires member approval and may need adjustment based on debate dynamics.
